title: Scientists squeeze catalysts inside host materials like a ship into a bottle

title_detail.value: Scientists squeeze catalysts inside host materials like a ship into a bottle

summary: Scientists have found a way to place catalysts inside the tiniest pores of different host materials, a bit like when model ships are unfolded inside a bottle.

summary_detail.value: Scientists have found a way to place catalysts inside the tiniest pores of different host materials, a bit like when model ships are unfolded inside a bottle.
